text: appeal allahuvinre peril kallam ketticcamaykkukayea, avanre telivukale nisedhiccutallukayea ceytavanekkal katutta akrami arunt‌? (allahuvinre) rekhayil tannalkk niscayiccittulla ohari attarakkarkku labhikkunnatan‌. avasanam avare marippikkuvanayi nam'mute dutanmar (malakkukal) avarute atutt cellumpeal avar parayum: allahuvin purame ninnal vilicc prart'thicc keantirunnavareakke evite? avar parayum : avareakke nannale vittupeayikkalannu. tannal satyanisedhikalayirunnuvenn avarkketirayi avar tanne saksyam vahikkukayum ceyyum
